module.name: resource_management
module.keywords: module, resource, resource management, event, location

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of resource management capabilities.
The following capabilities is provided by the resource management module:

ul.li: Resource availability may be specified by quantity and location;
Resource provision, allocation and issuing events may be scheduled and recorded;
Future resource provisions may be designated to specific locations;
Relationships between planned and actual resource events may be recorded;
Relationships between resource event and the corresponding resource requirement, usage or consumption may be recorded.

inscope.li: Scheduling and recording of resource provision, allocation and issuing;
Relationships between allocated resources and the corresponding resource requirements.

outscope.li: Identification and detailed descriptions of resource items;
Recording of used or consumed resources.

description.p: The Resource_management UoF provides the capability to record :

ul.li: resource events such as resource provision, allocation and issuing.
